comments: Created 1894 from the rural part of the parish of Stansfield.

Abolished 30.9.1897 and added to the parish of Todmorden. 
    See also Table 2, note (a).

Created 1894  out of the parishes of Wadsworth, Heptonstall, 
    Erringden and Stansfield. Abolished 1.4.1937 and added to the parish of 
    Hebden Royd.
Created 1.4.1937 from the parishes of Hebden Bridge and Mytholmroyd.
Abolished 30.9.1897 and added to the parish of Todmorden.

Created 1894 from the parts of the parishes of Wadsworth, Sowerby, 
    Erringden and Midgeley, in Mytholmroyd Urban District. Abolished 1.4.1937 and added to the parish of Hebden Royd. See also Table 2, note (b).
Abolished 30.9.1897 and added to the parish of Todmorden.

Created 30.9.1897 from the parishes of Stansfield, Todmorden & Walsden, 
    Langfield and Cornholme.

Transferred from Lancashire to Yorkshire West Riding in 1889. 
    Abolished 30.9.1897 and added to the parish of Todmorden.
